name: gerifinancial
description: Financial management application with bank scraping capabilities

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && wait-on http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3001 && npm run cypress:open"
scripts.test:e2e:headless: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && wait-on http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3001 && npm run cypress:run"
scripts.test:e2e:auth: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && wait-on http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3001 && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/auth/**/*.cy.ts'"
scripts.test:e2e:bank: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && wait-on http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3001 && npm run cypress:run --spec 'cypress/e2e/bank/**/*.cy.ts'"
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e:headless
